sentences.sentence: More than 280 people have been killed and 800 injured after three trains collided in India's worst rail disaster in decades.

sentences.sentence: Serb protesters gathered outside a town hall in northern Kosovo where an ethnically Albanian mayor was selected in April elections they'd boycotted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The worst rail crash for decades in India left at least 280 people dead as two high-speed passenger trains collided in Odisha state.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Rescuers took more than 850 people away for treatment, many for critical injuries, as the search for any other survivors continued in the mangled wreckage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A railway ministry spokesman said that 10 to 12 train coaches derailed and fell into a nearby track.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Their debris was hit by another passenger train coming from the opposite direction, derailing up to three coaches of the second train.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A third train carrying freight was also involved in the accident.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Officials said 1,200 rescuers and local protesters gathered in the town of Zvekan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It's in the Serb-majority Mitrovica region, and they're demanding the removal of ethnically Albanian mayors elected in April elections largely boycotted by the region's Serbs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: They also want the withdrawal of Kosovo's special forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The protest took place in the presence of KFOR soldiers, NATO-led peacekeepers who stepped up their presence in Svekan following clashes on May 29 that left 80 people injured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Kosovo's Prime Minister Albin Koti accused Belgrade of orchestrating those clashes, saying they were planned, well-organized and had an author. He said the author is official Belgrade of orchestrating those clashes, saying they were planned, well-organized and had an author. He said the author is official Belgrade. Kosovo, a former region of Serbia, became independent in 2008, but has never been recognized by Belgrade.

US Secretary of State Antony Blinken refuted calls for a quick ceasefire, saying a strong Ukraine was a prerequisite for talks with Moscow and describing Vladimir Putin's war as a failure.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We believe the prerequisite for meaningful diplomacy and real peace is a stronger Ukraine, capable of deterring and defending against any future aggression.

sentences.sentence: Iran released two Austrians and a Dane who had been jailed by the government in Tehran.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: One of the released Austrians was arrested in 2016 for allegedly spying for the United States, the other in 2019 for what were described as national security offences.
